title: HIV funding and estimated future requirements
subtitle: Estimated resources dedicated to prevention, treatment and care of [HIV](#dod:hiv) compared to UNAIDS estimates of annual resource needs to meet [Fast-Track HIV targets](#dod:fast-track-unaids-hiv) by 2030.
